original: Bergde, Anders Oscar Gösta, komminister, Grinneröd, Ljungskile, f. 19/ 7/03 i Lysekil av tulitj :m. Oscar Olsison o. Gerda Högström. G. 32 m. Ruth Win-berg. Barn: Bengt f. 36, Gunilla 37, Birgitta 39. — Stud:ex. 26, teol. fil. ex. 27, teol. kand. 30, prakt. teol. pr. s. å., prästv. 31. Kommin. i Gullhol-men 31, i Grinneröd fr. 38. Ordf. i skolråd, led. av Grinneröds kyrkoråd, Forshälia past. kyrkoråd, Ljungs bar-nav:nd.
translated: Bergde, Anders Oscar Gösta, minister, Grinneröd, Ljungskile, born July 19, 1903 in Lysekil to parents Oscar Olsison and Gerda Högström. Married to Ruth Winberg in 1932 with three children: Bengt (born 1936), Gunilla (born 1937), and Birgitta (born 1939). Completed secondary school in 1926, theology degree in 1927, practical theology training in the same year, and was ordained in 1931. Worked as a minister in Gullholmen starting in 1931 and later moved to Grinneröd in 1938. He served as the chairman of the school board and was a member of the Grinneröd church council, Forshälia pastoral church council, and Ljungs child welfare organization.
